item.title: Tailscale: Indistinguishable from magic
item.description: Introducing Tailscale: … and the magic of pairing Tailscale and pfSense Redefining network topologies: Wow. Just wow. It isn’t often a novel project impresses me as thoroughly as Tailscale! There’s something magical about a project which ticks so many boxes; It’s ‘simple’ to setup, boasts near unlimited use cases, can be overlayed on top of an existing network - and it’s ‘free’ tier is rather generous for individuals and likely to be all one needs.
